# Stats

> Standard library statistical functions.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var statistics = require( '@stdlib/math/stats' );
```

#### statistics

Standard library statistical functions.

```javascript
var stats = statistics;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

```javascript
var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();
var statistics = require( '@stdlib/math/stats' );

console.log( getKeys( statistics ) );
```
